actions.name: Dry Skin
actions.description: Effect: The user recovers 4 Ticks of HP when hit by a Water-Type attack, and recovers a tick of HP at the end of their turn in Rainy Weather. The user takes 25% more damage from Fire-Type attacks, and loses a Tick of HP at the end of their turn in Sunny Weather.

system.description: Effect: The user recovers 4 Ticks of HP when hit by a Water-Type attack, and recovers a tick of HP at the end of their turn in Rainy Weather. The user takes 25% more damage from Fire-Type attacks, and loses a Tick of HP at the end of their turn in Sunny Weather.
